Notes: The plant will be located near the Zhoushan Island.
The electricity generated from the plant will be supplied to a resort built by the Reignwood Group. This will be a closed loop system.
The plant is located at WaveRoller Research Center in Jarvenpaa.

Source Plant Name: La Reunion Island Wave Energy Project
Power Plant Name: La Reunion Island Wave Energy Project
Project Name: La Reunion Island Wave Energy Project
Notes: The project can be expanded up to 15MW. The project is jointly funded by EDF EN and both the French and La Reunion Governments. The manufacture and installation of the unit is being managed by DCNS.

This project received public co-financing from the French State and other funds from local and public administration authorities through ERDF funds from the Brittany region. The project also received loan from Finistere department and Quimper conurbation community. During its first year of operation, it will provide 250 kW of power and then up to 1 MW.
METKA is a EPC contractor of the project. METKA has awarded a contract to Alstom Hydro to supply turbine-generators.

Source Plant Name: Liaoning Linghai China Resource Power Wind Power Wind Farm
Power Plant Name: Liaoning Linghai China Resource Power Wind Power Wind Farm
Project Name: Liaoning Linghai China Resource Power Wind Power Wind Farm IC
